about_the_game:
Add Grimgig Railway to your wishlist to support us 🌸

Welcome and congratulations, it's your first day as a locomotive driver on the Sakura National Railway! 🌸

It's your duty to keep the train moving and take it to the next station.

Whether you are providing freight services or a luxury trip by rail, the fires of motivation within you should burn as brightly as the fire in your engine. 

We provide the highest in service standards, and your services are no exception.

A balance between pressure and speed is essential, but taking care of the company’s hardware is even more important! Be sure to keep an eye on your new teammate using the camera system — you will need to check if it’s ███████ or ███, you never know what can happen!

Good luck, and we’ll talk tomorrow night, when you arrive to the next station. Safe travels, ███!

Horror on Rails

Grimgig Railway is a horror game with train simulation elements where you’ll need to keep calm and face your fears. You’ll drive the train across an old railway in Sakura valley, deep in the Japanese countryside. Search stations and villages for answers to what happened to the region.

  • You’ll find out soon enough why not everyone can keep this job.

  • Manage the locomotive’s speed, pressure and fuel

  • Watch the TV circuit for abnormal activities in the train cars.

  • Collect mail bags

  • Visit stations and Villages

  • Look for anomalies

  • And of course, you can even use the train whistle. Choo-choo!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
